context_0.vignette: Heinz's wife has recently fallen ill and needs an expensive medication that is not covered by her medical insurance. They do not have the money needed to purchase the expensive prescription medication, but they know that it is vital for her to have it if she is going to recover.

reach out to different organizations or charities that might be able to help cover the cost of the medication
explore alternative options like consulting with their doctor to identify any generic or less expensive medications that might work
reach out to the pharmaceutical company that produces the medication

explore various options to afford the medicine such as discussing financial assistance options with the medical provider, contacting the medication's manufacturer for possible assistance, exploring generic versions of the medicine, looking into charities that assist with healthcare costs, or seeking help from their community through crowdfunding or donations
explore all possible options for assistance

context_1.vignette: Josh is on the way to the airport to catch a flight for a hunting safari in Africa. He leaves with plenty of time to make it there, but his car breaks down on the highway. Now Josh is sitting in his car near a busy intersection, and knows he needs to get to airport soon if he is going to catch his flight.
context_1.prompt: One thing that Josh should do is to
generation: call a taxi, an Uber, or any other form of quick transportation to the airport while also arranging for his broken down car to be towed or fixed later
call a taxi, rideshare service like Uber or Lyft, or possibly roadside assistance if that is an option
call for roadside assistance or a taxi to take him to the airport
call for roadside assistance or a taxi in order to get to the airport on time
call a taxi, an Uber, or a friend who could take him to the airport
call a taxi, a ride-share service, or someone he knows to pick him up and take him to the airport
call a taxi or use a ride sharing app like Uber or Lyft to get to the airport
call a taxi or use a ride-sharing service like Uber or Lyft to get to the airport as soon as possible
call a taxi, Uber, or other ride service
call for a taxi, Uber, or any other available ride-share service while also contacting an emergency automobile service to handle his broken down car

context_2.vignette: Brian is the evening manager at a bakery. Near the end of the day, he realizes that $50.75 is missing from the register and that he is responsible for accounting for the money at the end of the day. Brian knows he has to make sure the register is balanced or he might lose his job.
context_2.prompt: One thing that Brian should do is to
generation: immediately report the discrepancy to his supervisor or the owner of the bakery, providing all the necessary details regarding the missing amount
immediately notify his supervisor or the owner about the discrepancy
contact his supervisor or the owner of the bakery to report the missing money
check the transactions for the day thoroughly and look for any mistakes
notify his supervisor or the owner of the business about the missing money
check the surveillance footage, if available, to see if there was a theft or if an error occurred during transactions
immediately report the discrepancy to the appropriate individual, such as his superior or the owner
check the CCTV footage, if available, to see what might have happened to the money
double check the register and receipts
investigate and re-count the cash in the register to ensure that there hasn't been any counting error
